ing: 1/2 cup fat-free creamy salad dressing (ie: Fat Free Miracle Whip TM)
1 head romaine lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces
des: "This is one of our favorite salad recipes. The combination of Romaine lettuce, toasted pecans, and fresh strawberries is unusual, but sooo good."
ins:
In a small bowl, mix together salad dressing, milk, sugar, vinegar, and poppy seeds.  Refrigerate until ready to use.
Combine lettuce, onion, strawberries, pecans, and red bell pepper in a salad bowl.  Toss with dressing.
